title: Pastel Clay
description: Ce style se distingue par un rendu 3D minimaliste aux textures mates et douces, rappelant la pâte à modeler ou le plastique lisse de haute qualité. L'éclairage diffus et les couleurs pastel créent une esthétique apaisante, propre et ludique, privilégiant les formes géométriques simples.
prompt: A pristine, minimalist 3D studio render of {{subject}} characterized by a soft, tactile surface finish resembling matte clay or smooth plastic. The object is rendered in {{primary_color}} with clean geometric lines, rounded edges, and a toy-like simplicity. The lighting is soft, diffuse, and uniform, utilizing global illumination to cast gentle, non-intrusive shadows against a flat, seamless {{accent_color}} background. The aesthetic is clean, modern, and soothing, avoiding excessive detail, noise, or harsh reflections to maintain a velvety appearance. 3d render, blender cycles, claymorphism, soft focus, pastel tones, matte finish, high fidelity, c4d, studio lighting, minimal, isometric view.
